title: Here is a lytell shorte cronycle, begynnynge at the. vii. ages of the worlde, w[ith] the comy[n]ge of Brute: and the reygne of all the kynges with the sayntes and martyrs that haue ben in this lande.
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
publicationDate: In the yere of our lorde M. CCCCC. and .xxx. the .xxv. of Iune] 1530]
publisher: [Imprynted by me Wynkyn de Worde, dwellynge in London in flete strete, at the sygne of the Sonne,
notes: An edition of the "Chronicle of all the kings".
In two parts. Part 2 title reads:"Here begynneth the cronycle of all ye ky[n]ges names that haue reygned in Englande syth the conquest"; it is a version of John Lydgate's chronicle in verse--STC.
Identified as STC 10012 on UMI microfilm reel 8 and unidentified on UMI microfilm reel 4.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 4 (part 2 only) and reel 8 (part 1 only).
